Full Description: WaterClick is a software company dedicated to accelerating the digitization of small and medium-size water and wastewater utilities. We operate a platform that streamlines the onboarding of digital tools, offers pre-configured integrations, and delivers a cloud-based dashboard and support desk, all via a subscription model.
